articles.author: Alasdair Belling
articles.title: How one man's court case opened the floodgates to a decade of gun violence in America - New Zealand Herald
articles.description: One court case back in 2003 changed the way Americans look at guns.
articles.content: Uvalde survivor: 'I don't want it to happen again'. Video / APIn 2003, policeman Dick Heller was part of a joint action in the US District Court of Washington, DC concerning the Second Amendment of t… [+7587 chars]
